response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000, which reflects its true value and the investment we have put into its development. We are confident that this product will provide substantial returns on your investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with purchasing the product, and we can arrange for delivery and any necessary support. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 15000}
